description:
In this course titled 'NLP- Learn How To Manage Others By Listening And Talking.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

Listening and talking are the two most important tools of human communication. If you donâ€™t know how to talk (what to say, appropriate time to say) or listen to people, you are missing out the best ways to influence people.

This course is designed to help you manage others by listening and talking to them in the most influential way.

In this lesson, you will learn about the importance of listening skills. You will learn what makes you a good listener and how good listening skills can help you influence people easily.

In this lesson, you will learn more about developing your listening skills. Learn how you can resolve arguments by listening and many interesting things about listening you will learn in this lesson.

This course is ideal for people who are into top level management and require to manage and influence their subordinates to get work done in the most effective manner,

You will also be able to trigger your confidence level and relax during times of need by following the exercises in this course.

This course contains a lot of NLP exercises and more than 35 minutes of live video content designed over 7 lectures in English and a bonus PDF.
title: NLP- Learn How To Manage Others By Listening And Talking
